subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Ted Nolan, who last coached in the N.H.L. with the Buffalo Sabres in 1997, has led the punchy, gritty Islanders to a 15-11-3 record.
snippet: Ted Nolan, who last coached in the N.H.L. with the Buffalo Sabres in 1997, has led the punchy, gritty Islanders to a 15-11-3 record.
